name: Backpack
description: A sturdy backpack made of durable fabric, designed to carry supplies and equipment for adventurers. It features multiple compartments and adjustable straps for comfort and convenience.

name: Rations (iron or standard)
description: Rations are pre-packaged food supplies designed to sustain adventurers during their journeys. Iron rations are durable and can last for weeks without spoiling, while standard rations are more palatable but have a shorter shelf life. Both types provide essential nourishment for long travels.

name: Waterskin
description: A waterskin is a flexible container made from leather or other durable materials, designed to hold liquids, primarily water. It features a secure closure to prevent leaks and is often carried by adventurers to stay hydrated during their journeys.

name: Torch
description: A torch is a simple yet essential tool for adventurers, made of a wooden stick with a flammable material at one end. When lit, it provides a steady flame that illuminates dark areas, making it invaluable for exploring caves, dungeons, and other shadowy locales.

name: Lantern
description: A lantern is a portable light source, typically made of metal and glass, designed to hold a flame or a magical light. It provides illumination in dark places, making it essential for adventurers exploring caves, dungeons, or during nighttime travels.

name: Rope (hemp or silk)
description: A sturdy length of rope made from either durable hemp or luxurious silk, used for climbing, securing objects, or creating makeshift traps. The hemp rope is rough and strong, while the silk rope is lighter and more flexible, making it suitable for various adventuring needs.

name: Grappling Hook
description: A grappling hook is a metal device with multiple prongs designed to catch onto surfaces, allowing adventurers to scale walls, cross chasms, or secure ropes for climbing. It is often used by rogues and explorers to navigate difficult terrain.

name: Lockpicks
description: A set of finely crafted metal tools designed for manipulating the internal mechanisms of locks. Lockpicks are essential for rogues and thieves, allowing them to gain access to locked doors, chests, and other secured areas without the need for a key.

name: Crowbar
description: A crowbar is a sturdy metal tool with a curved end, designed for prying, lifting, and breaking apart objects. It is often used by adventurers to open locked doors, remove obstacles, or as a makeshift weapon in desperate situations.

name: Climbing Gear
description: Climbing gear includes essential tools such as pitons, carabiners, and a harness, designed to ensure safety and stability while scaling steep cliffs and rocky terrains. The gear is made from durable materials to withstand the rigors of climbing.

name: Map and Compass
description: A map and compass set is essential for any adventurer navigating through uncharted territories. The map is a detailed representation of the surrounding area, marked with landmarks, paths, and potential dangers, while the compass provides direction, ensuring that the adventurer can find their way back or explore new routes with confidence.

name: Healer's Kit
description: A healer's kit is a collection of medical supplies and tools used by adventurers to treat wounds and ailments. It typically includes bandages, antiseptics, herbs, and other essential items for stabilizing injuries and providing first aid.

name: Tent
description: A tent is a portable shelter made of fabric or other materials, supported by poles and secured to the ground with stakes. It provides protection from the elements, making it an essential item for adventurers during their travels and camping.

name: Mirror
description: A polished glass mirror set in a decorative frame, capable of reflecting images clearly. It is often used by adventurers to check their appearance or to signal allies from a distance.

name: 10-Foot Pole
description: A sturdy wooden pole measuring ten feet in length, often used by adventurers to probe for traps, cross chasms, or as a makeshift lever. Its length makes it versatile for various tasks in exploration and dungeon delving.

name: Blanket or Bedroll
description: A warm and durable blanket or bedroll made from thick wool or canvas, designed to provide comfort and insulation during rest. It can be easily rolled up for transport and is essential for adventurers who need to sleep outdoors or in rough conditions.

name: Flint and Steel
description: Flint and steel is a simple yet essential tool for starting fires. It consists of a piece of flint, a hard rock that can produce sparks when struck, and a steel striker that creates the spark needed to ignite tinder. This combination is favored by adventurers for its reliability and effectiveness in the wild.

name: Potion Vials
description: Potion vials are small glass containers used to hold various potions and elixirs. They come in different shapes and sizes, often sealed with corks or wax to preserve the contents. Some vials are adorned with intricate designs, indicating the potency or type of potion within.

name: Sack or Bag
description: A simple sack or bag made of sturdy fabric or leather, used for carrying various items. It is versatile and can hold anything from food supplies to adventuring gear, making it an essential item for any traveler.

name: Spyglass
description: A spyglass is a compact telescope designed for long-distance viewing. It is often made of polished brass and glass, allowing adventurers to scout distant locations, observe enemy movements, or admire the beauty of the landscape from afar.
